rooms.name: Engineering
rooms.description: This is the engineering room, where the Engineering Officer works.

rooms.name: Engine Room
rooms.description: This is the engine room. The internally accessible parts of the drive array are here.

rooms.name: Life Support
rooms.description: The life support systems are managed and maintained in this room.

rooms.name: Systems Hallway
rooms.description: I am in the systems hallway. This connects the rooms on the Engineering Deck.

rooms.name: Ramp A
rooms.description: This is hte ramp that connects the Engineering Deck with the Crew Deck.

rooms.name: Main Hallway
rooms.description: This is the main hallway, which connects all of the rooms on the Crew Deck.

rooms.name: Lavatory
rooms.description: I am in the crew's lavatory. It is surprisingly messy.

rooms.name: Hypersleep Pods
rooms.description: The hypersleep pods are in this room. The crew are all in their pods. The readouts all display warnings.

rooms.name: Crew Quarters
rooms.description: These are the crew quarters. There are several bunks and some foot lockers.

rooms.name: Mess Hall
rooms.description: I am in the mess hall. There are two tables and several chairs, with a small kitchen and pantry in the back.

rooms.name: Medical Bay
rooms.description: This is the medical bay, where the medical officer treats illnesses and injuries.

rooms.name: Docking Bay
rooms.description: This is the docking bay. It is currently locked down.

rooms.name: Security
rooms.description: This is the security office. The security officer monitors the ship and docking bay here.

rooms.name: Ramp B
rooms.description: This is the ramp that connects the Crew Deck and the Command Deck.

rooms.name: Bridge
rooms.description: This is the bridge, the command center of the ship.

rooms.name: Communications
rooms.description: This the communications room. The equipment is intact but non-functional.

rooms.name: Navigation
rooms.description: This is the navigation officer's office. The current course is set for Proxima Centauri b.

rooms.name: Bridge Hallway
rooms.description: This is the bridge hallway. It leads from the bridge to the captain's quarters.

rooms.name: Captain's Quarters
rooms.description: I am in the captain's quarters. The captain's office and bed are here.
